revised_title: Investigation of the Composition and Properties of Oil of Wine and the Formation of a New Compound
tldr: The author examines the composition and properties of oil of wine, a product of the distillation of sulphuric acid and alcohol. Through a series of experiments, he discovers a new compound formed by the combination of sulphuric acid, carbon, and hydrogen, and investigates its reactions with various substances, including muriate of baryta and potash.
